body.p:
Owsley County Kentucky
To his Excellency Beriah McGoffin Esq
Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

whereas at the October Term of the owsley Circuit court there was a fine assesed against your Petitioner (E) ^Ezekiel^ M. Rose of Said County by the verdict of a Jury and the Judgement of the court for carrying concealed weapons (a Pistol) for the sum of fifty Dollars fine Your Petioner E. M. Rose did verily beleive that his person was in actual danger of violence from the hands of another man at the time he carried Said weapon. The Said E. M. Rose being a good citizen and :a man of a family, and of quiet disposition when not initiated and interupted by others The undersigned would respectfully ask your excellency to remit Said fine of $50. your Petioners beleiving it to be a case worthy of excellency clemency,

Thos Murell ,,
